name: minismac2d

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Proxy Application. Solves the finite-differenced 2D incompressible
Navier-Stokes equations with Spalart-Allmaras one-equation turbulence
model on a structured body conforming grid.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Intel MPI. This package has been replaced by intel-oneapi-mpi. LICENSE
